info.title: O2 Telefonica API
info.description:
The Opal Vouchers Service integrates with O2â€™s systems, enabling them to 
create and cancel vouchers in our platform, being also responsible of
notifying O2 when any of those vouchers has been utilized.

post.summary: Creates a voucher in the Melody system and returns the new code
post.description:
O2 will be able to create a voucher in our system by submitting a
request to this endpoint. As a result, a new voucher code will be
created in our platform with the `allocated` status.

delete.summary: Removes a voucher from the Melody system
delete.description:
O2 has the ability of cancelling a voucher through this endpoint, setting
its status to `cancelled`. That should either prevent the code to be
redeemed or automatically cancel any subscription the voucher has been
exchanged for.
